'Srinivasa Iyer Ramaswamy', also known as 'Cho Ramaswamy' (born October 5, 1934)
is a leading journalist, comedian, playwright, critic, lawyer and columnist from
Tamil Nadu, India. He is an editor of the popular Tamil magazine [[Thuglak]]. He
is also known as 'Cho'.
categories: Nominated members of the Rajya Sabha
